about.heroSubtitle: Innovation in marketing serving merchants and consumers
about.notGambling: Our platform is NOT a gambling site
about.visionDesc: At Black Friday Check, we believe it's possible to create a world where merchants gain visibility, customers discover quality products at affordable prices, and technology makes commercial communication more attractive, interactive and fair.
about.customersDiscoverDesc: Find quality products at affordable prices
about.techMakesDesc: Makes communication more interactive and fair
about.step1Desc: When a shop wants to promote a product, it launches a promotional campaign. For example, a smartphone worth 10,000 FCFA.
about.step2Desc: The campaign offers a maximum of 100 tickets at 200 FCFA each. Once all 100 tickets are sold, a transparent draw selects the winner of the product.
about.step3Desc: The 99 other participants receive a discount voucher worth 1,000 to 1,500 FCFA, usable for any purchase of 10,000 FCFA or more in the concerned shop.
about.transparencyDesc: All campaign rules are public and verifiable
about.equityDesc: Draws are automated, secure and controlled
about.responsibilityDesc: We refuse any model that pushes users to spend without real benefit
about.valueSharingDesc: The merchant sells, the customer benefits, the platform is remunerated fairly
about.winChanceDesc: Chance to win a product at mini price
about.guaranteedDiscountDesc: A guaranteed discount voucher if they don't win the draw
about.discoverShopsDesc: Discovery of new shops and new products
about.notLikeGambling: Unlike gambling or betting sites, we:
about.noBetsWithLoss: No bets with risk of total loss
about.noAddiction: Don't play on addiction or illusion of quick gain
about.noRevenueFromLoss: Don't generate revenue from user losses
about.everyTicketIsParticipation: With us, every ticket is a participatory purchase in a promotional campaign
about.commitmentDesc: Black Friday Check is not a casino, is not a gambling game, and never will be.
about.missionDesc: Our mission is to create a healthy marketing ecosystem, where every actor wins and where the value created benefits everyone.
about.campaignText1: For only 200 FCFA, join our participatory purchase and try to win this product worth 10,000 FCFA!
about.campaignText3: And good news: if you don't win the draw, you still leave with a 2,000 FCFA discount voucher valid on any purchase ‚â• 10,000 FCFA in our shop.
about.campaignText4: Visit us in store to enjoy your discount and discover our products!
